lessons.japanese: 君は試験に受かるように一生懸命勉強すべきだ。
lessons.english: You should study hard so that you can pass the examination.

lessons.japanese: 一生懸命勉強すれば試験に受かるでしょう。
lessons.english: If you work hard, you'll pass your exam.

lessons.japanese: 一生懸命勉強しなさい、そうすれば試験に受かるだろう。
lessons.english: Work hard, and you will pass the examination.

lessons.japanese: われわれは英検２級に受かるために勉強しているのです。
lessons.english: We are studying in order to pass the STEP 2nd grade test.

lessons.japanese: どんな試験にも受かるように一生懸命勉強しなさい。
lessons.english: You should work hard so that you can pass any exam you take.

lessons.japanese: ジョンはたぶん試験に受かるだろう。
lessons.english: Probably John will pass the examination.

lessons.japanese: こつこつやれば受験に受かるだろう。
lessons.english: Stick at it, and you'll pass the exam.

lessons.japanese: あなたが試験に受かることは確かだよ。
lessons.english: That you will pass the exam is certain.

lessons.japanese: 彼は成績がいいから必ず大学に受かるだろう。
lessons.english: Due to his high grades, he will inevitably be accepted to the university.

lessons.japanese: 彼は試験に受かる努力をした。
lessons.english: He made an effort to pass the examination.

lessons.japanese: 彼は試験に受かるように一生懸命勉強した。
lessons.english: He worked hard in order to pass the examination.

lessons.japanese: 彼は試験に受かるために一生懸命勉強している。
lessons.english: He is working hard to pass the examination.

lessons.japanese: 彼は今の調子で勉強すればきっと試験に受かるだろう。
lessons.english: He is sure to pass the exam if he studies at this rate.

lessons.japanese: 彼はどれだけ一生懸命やっても試験に受かるのはむりだろう。
lessons.english: No matter how hard he may work, he will not be able to pass the exams.

lessons.japanese: 彼が試験に受かるのは間違いない。
lessons.english: It is certain that he will pass the examination.
